extension.description: In this wizard you will find the latest Playonmonkeys build....Without work from the Devs and Streaming Websites this would not of been possible! Thanks whufclee@ TotalXBMC,GUYS @ TI, FTG, MuckyDuck, ][NT3L][G3NC][ for the app installer and all Developers who created add-ons used in my build. Also a very special Thanks to Surfacingx for the code used in this add-on. Visit www.mediacenterwizards.com for more info and support.
